title: Recently renovated /North Quincy/Heat & HW included.
posting_body: Spacious one bedroom apartment recently renovated with a NEWER fully appliance kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
It's in a quaint and clean building with a private balcony.
It is a short walk to the North Quincy T station and a 4 minute drive to Marina Bay.
Cable and internet ready, on site laundry facilities, 24 hour emergency maintenance, designated parking.
Great neighborhood and literally a five minute drive to Rt 93.
Call Tony Gonatas at 617-438-5493 or visit our website at <URL> no
